Elementary parents: please be advised that we have enabled student emails in order to make it easier for them to join online meetings and receive Classroom notifications during #RemoteLearning .

Our email is a "walled garden", meaning no outside emails can be sent or received unless we whitelist the domain for academic reasons.

The content of all email is logged on our servers.

Some students may have "district news" emails from many years ago ... when we first enabled student email for high schoolers in 2014, it was discovered that students were receiving district news emails, and they were removed from that distribution group at that time. Please advise your child to simply delete those old emails.

Student email is new for elementary teachers, so please email the help desk at help@sau8.org if you have questions about this.

-Technology Director, Pam McLeod
